00022 #ifndef CMDLINECONF_H
00023 #define CMDLINECONF_H
00024 
00025 #include "global.h"
00026 
00027 // constants/macros/typdefs
00028 
00029 // size of command database
00030 // (maximum number of commands the cmdline system can handle)
00031 #define CMDLINE_MAX_COMMANDS    10
00032 
00033 // maximum length (number of characters) of each command string
00034 // (quantity must include one additional byte for a null terminator)
00035 #define CMDLINE_MAX_CMD_LENGTH  15
00036 
00037 // allotted buffer size for command entry
00038 // (must be enough chars for typed commands and the arguments that follow)
00039 #define CMDLINE_BUFFERSIZE      80
00040 
00041 // number of lines of command history to keep
00042 // (each history buffer is CMDLINE_BUFFERSIZE in size)
00043 // ***** ONLY ONE LINE OF COMMAND HISTORY IS CURRENTLY SUPPORTED
00044 #define CMDLINE_HISTORYSIZE     1
00045 
00046 #endif
